name: Wikimotive's Task Forms for ClickUp – Free
author: Aaron Pratt

sections.description:
What does Wikimotive’s Task Forms for ClickUp plugin do?

This plugin connects your WordPress site to your ClickUp tasks board via their Cloud API. You can create custom forms and format them to submit tasks to a selected ClickUp task list.

Maybe you want a support ticketing system for your site, or you have a dashboard for your employees and would like to assign specially formatted tasks to your team members. You can do that with this plugin.

Placing the form on your site:

Once you’ve created your form you’ll be able to place it anywhere on your site with the use of the shortcode below.
[ctf_form id=”{Form ID}”]

The shortcode for each form is provided at the top of the form editor page.
sections.installation:
Installation Instuctions:
1. Download and install the plugin from the WordPress Plugins Repository located here: https://wordpress.org/plugins/wikimotive-clickup-task-forms-free/
2. Activate the plugin
3. For configuration instructions, please see the “Help” page in the ClickUp Forms WordPress Admin Submenu
